to.info: Traded Antoine Vermette to Blackhawks for Klas Dahlbeck, 2015 first round pick on 2015-02-28

Traded Kimmo Timonen to Blackhawks for 2015 second round pick, 2016 conditional round pick (second round if Blackhawks advance to 2015 Stanley Cup Finals and Timonen plays in at least 50% of the games, third round if Blackhawks advance to third round of 2015 playoffs and Timonen plays in at least 50% of the games, else fourth round) on 2015-02-27

from.info: Blackhawks received 2015 second round pick (#54) as compensation for unsigned 2010 draft pick Kevin Hayes
Traded Daniel Carcillo to Kings for 2015 conditional round pick (fifth round if Carcillo plays 40 or more games with the Kings in the 2013-14 season, else sixth round) on 2013-07-16

to.info: Traded Kimmo Timonen to Blackhawks for 2015 second round pick, 2016 conditional round pick (second round if Blackhawks advance to 2015 Stanley Cup Finals and Timonen plays in at least 50% of the games, third round if Blackhawks advance to third round of 2015 playoffs and Timonen plays in at least 50% of the games, else fourth round) on 2015-02-27

from.info: Traded Brandon Pirri to Panthers for 2014 third round pick, 2016 fifth round pick on 2014-03-02

to.info: , Traded Andrew Desjardins to Blackhawks for Ben Smith, 2017 conditional seventh round pick on 2015-03-02 (Conditions on pick are unconfirmed.)
